message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly known as depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see various line items under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities." The item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is "Depreciation."

From the given statement, I can see:
- Depreciation: 91509.25
- Date: 2024-02-05

This is the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91509.25'}}
```
